officialTitle: Effect of Lactobacillus Reuteri DSM 17938 to Prevent Antibiotic-associated Diarrhea in Children: Prospective, Multi-center, Randomize, Parallel Group Placebo Controlled Clinical Trial
inclusionCriteria:
• Children receiving amoxicilline-clavulanic acid (50-90 mg/kg/day, twice daily) due to acute otitis media or acute sinusitis
* Must have minimum age of 6 Months
* Must have maximum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Receiving antibiotic and/or probiotic, 8 weeks before the study
* Chronic gastrointestinal system disorders
* Congenital anomalies
* Chronic diseases
* Chemotherapy and radiotherapy
* Pregnancy
